title: Citizen AR 2.0 Mens Watch CA042104E Overview
description:
Citizen Eco-Drive Mens Blue Stainless Watch - CA0421-04E - http://www.abt.com/product/65288/Citizen-CA042104E.html

Take action and show your inner drive with the rich styling of a 1/5 second chrono measuring up to 60 minutes. Proprietary blue chroma finishing enhances the 44.5mm steel case. Featuring 12/24 hour time date luminous accents and 100M WR. Drive’s pierced metal motif appears on the black dial and strap with the crown’s “D” completing this edgy look. From the Citizen Design Studios Drive from Citizen Eco-Drive is fueled by light any light so it never needs a battery.
Specifications:
• Movement: Eco-Drive B612
• Functions: 1/5 Second Chronograph 12 / 24 hour
• Band: Black Polyurethane Band Buckle
• Case Size: 44mm
• Case Material: Two Tone Stainless Steel
• Crystal: Mineral Crystal
• Water-Resistance: WR100 - 333ft (100m)
